documentation.title: Closing Brace Indentation
documentation.standard: This checks the indention of the closing brace of a scope
The closing curly brace must start on a new line.

code.title: Valid: The closing curly brace starts on a new line.
Invalid: The closing curly brace doesn't starts on a new line.

documentation.standard: Closing braces should be indented at the same level as the beginning of the scope.

code.title: Valid: Consistent indentation level for scope.
Invalid: The ending brace is indented further than the if statement.
